rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"// Case Exchange ownership. The variable $G.CEOwnershipSM is set here and used in form input condition and DOs to manage the update rights of an Incident, TRUE ownership is in SM; FALSE ownership is in other system\u000aif (vars.$L_file_save[\"problem.status\"] == vars.$L_file[\"problem.status\"]) {\u000a vars.$G_CEOwnershipSM = true;\u000a var externalActive = lib.CaseExchangeExternalReferencesDAO.isExternalActive(\"probsummary\", vars.$L_file[\"number\"]);\u000a if ((vars.$L_file[\"problem.status\"] === \"Pending Customer\" || vars.$L_file[\"problem.status\"] === \"Pending Vendor\") && externalActive) {\u000a vars.$G_CEOwnershipSM = false;\u000a }\u000a}"}
